description: XMP namespace tag definitions with PrintConv implementations for individual tag extraction

tables.description: Dublin Core namespace (dc) - title, description, subject, creator, rights
Basic XMP namespace (xmp) - CreateDate, ModifyDate, MetadataDate, CreatorTool, Rating
XMP rights management namespace (xmpRights) - license, attribution, permissions
Photoshop namespace (photoshop) - City, Country, Source, Categories
EXIF-in-XMP namespace (exif) - camera settings, exposure, lens data
Adobe auxiliary namespace (aux) - lens and camera auxiliary data
IPTC Core namespace (iptc4xmpCore) - location and rights metadata
XMP Media Management namespace (xmpMM) - history, versioning, document management
Adobe Lightroom namespace (lr) - hierarchical keywords and processing
